attributes.action: remove all speed humps on the grounds they are dangerous
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speed humps delay the emergency services and can cause dangerous tyre & suspension faults to vehicles. 

Recent reports by the fire/ambulance services have all stated that the humps are costing lives due to increasing their response times.

The constant brake then accelerate driving style that these humps encourage increases fuel consumption and must be bad for the environment.
